description.raw:
Add a pose\_publisher system that can be attached to models to publish pose of its links. Pose The system takes optional sdf arguments to also allow publishing of collision and visual pose data if needed.

To test, launch gazebo with the example world:

```
ign-gazebo -v4 -f examples/worlds/pose_publisher.sdf
```

and listen to the pose topic

```
ign topic -e -t "/model/double_pendulum_with_base/pose
```

‌

There is also an [accompanying PR in ros1\_ign\_bridge](https://github.com/osrf/ros1_ign_bridge/pull/4) \(update: PR merged\). The bridge converts the ign pose msgs to TFs , e.g.

```
roscore &
parameter_bridge /model/double_pendulum_with_base/pose@geometry_msgs/TransformStamped@ignition.msgs.Pose &
rostopic echo /model/double_pendulum_with_base/pose
```

title: [A-8] Add pose publisher system
